alternativeNames: Ho, Ting Nong; He, Ting Nong
examples: Swertia ser. Divaricatae T.N. He & S.W. Liu in Acta Phytotax. Sin., 18(1): 75  (1980). Gentiana striolata T.N. Ho in Acta Phytotax. Sin. 23(1): 51 (1985).
source: from 'A Dictionary of the Families and Genera of Chinese Seed Plants' ed. How  Foon-chew (1982); Index Herbariorum, ed. 8. See also Index Herb. Sin.: 403 & 284  (1993). Death year from David E. Boufford (GH)
